gum.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: your gums are the two areas of firm pink flesh at the top and bottom of your mouth, in which your teeth are fixed
gum.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a type of glue used to stick light things such as paper together
gum.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: a sticky substance found in the stems of some trees
gum.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: to stick things together using glue
gum.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: A large label had been gummed to the back of the photograph.
